PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-15842018-12-14,  ,  PCH,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectDisposal and lease of real properties **NCC**
PrecisOrder Authorizing the National Capital Commission to (1) dispose of real property to the City of Ottawa; (2) grant 99 years easements each, in favour of the City of Ottawa; and (3) grant a lease for a period of 30 years for the construction and operation of the City of Ottawa's Stage 2 Light Rail Transit Project.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
